p: Vigilant attention should be intensified in the postpartum period to monitor the mother’s signs and symptoms and detect any worsening of the mothers’ health conditions early ( 43) . Even though hyperthermia is the symptom most frequently reported in the SARS-CoV-2 infection, a differential diagnosis should be made, considering that other pathologies may be associated, while other specific signs and symptoms of the respiratory infection caused by COVID-19 should be also investigated ( 28) .
